message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient has undergone hysterectomy with bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy, which reduces estrogen and testosterone levels. Decreased testosterone is a known cause of loss of libido. Chronic alcohol intake can also decrease libido, but the history does not suggest that it is the primary cause. Major depressive disorder and elevated prolactin can also cause loss of libido, but the history does not support these diagnoses.
